description: This file is a PHP source file that renders a web page for backing up user settings with a secure key. It includes external PHP scripts for headers, utilities, navigation, and footer, and contains embedded JavaScript for form validation and AJAX submission.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Handles the click event on the save button; retrieves the secure key value, sends it via AJAX to save, and triggers download and page redirection on success.

methods.name: popUp
methods.description: Opens a new popup window with specified URL for downloading user settings.
